com.daohoangson.uml.parser
Class AutomataStateEdge

java.lang.Object
  com.daohoangson.uml.parser.AutomataStateEdge

 class AutomataStateEdge
extends java.lang.Object

An automata state edge connecting 2 states together.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Dao Hoang Son
See Also:

Field Detail

type

int type
The edge type. Possible values:
  • -1 means connection is a string
  • 0 means will match any character
  • greater than 0 means will match a specific character

connection

java.lang.String connection
The connection string if available

next

AutomataState next
The target state

Method Detail

matches

boolean matches(java.lang.String string,
                int offset)
Checks if this edge matches the string at the specified offset. Process based on the type value

Parameters:
string - the string need matching
offset - the offset to start looking
Returns:
true if matched found
